title: Email-based User Signup with Domain Whitelist Enforcement
description: Verify that a new user can sign up with an email address from an allowed domain, and receives a confirmation email before accessing the platform.

steps.description: Navigate to signup page
Enter a valid email address with domain included in whitelist
Submit signup form with valid password
Verify that signup is successful and confirmation email is sent
Confirm email by clicking the confirmation link
Verify that user can now sign in

title: Signup Rejection for Email Outside Whitelist
description: Verify that signup attempts with emails outside the allowed domain whitelist are blocked and appropriate error displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to signup page
Enter an email address with domain NOT in whitelist
Submit signup form
Verify that signup is rejected with appropriate domain whitelist error message

title: OAuth Login via Google and GitHub
description: Verify user can successfully sign in using OAuth providers Google and GitHub.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Click on Google OAuth button
Verify user is redirected to Google sign-in and can successfully authenticate
Sign out and repeat steps using GitHub OAuth button
Verify user successfull authentication via GitHub and login to platform

title: Unique Username Generation with Collision Handling
description: Verify that when a user creates or edits a profile, the username is autogenerated and collisions are handled properly to ensure uniqueness.

steps.description: Create a new user profile with desired username
Verify username is autogenerated and is unique
Attempt to create another user profile with same username or similar input
Verify system appends suffix or modifies to produce unique username without error

title: Avatar Upload and Display
description: Verify users can upload avatars using UploadThing and that the avatars display correctly on their profile pages.

steps.description: Navigate to profile edit page
Upload avatar image via UploadThing widget
Verify upload success notification
Navigate to user's profile page
Verify uploaded avatar image is displayed correctly

title: Add and Edit Social Links and Bio in User Profile
description: Verify users can add, update and remove social links and bio text in their profile with proper persistence.

steps.description: Navigate to profile edit page
Add new social link with valid URL and enter bio text
Save changes
Verify changes are saved and displayed when viewing profile
Edit social links and bio to remove or update content
Save changes
Verify updates reflect appropriately on profile page

title: Project Submission with Unique SEO-friendly Slug
description: Verify users can submit new projects with required details, and system generates a unique SEO-friendly slug automatically.

steps.description: Navigate to new project submission page
Fill in project title, description, select category, and upload project image
Submit the project
Verify project is created successfully and slug is unique and SEO-friendly in the URL

title: Automatic Favicon Fetch for Project URL
description: Verify that upon project submission, the system fetches and displays the favicon automatically from the project URL or site.

steps.description: Submit new project with project URL included
Verify the system fetches the favicon correctly and displays it on the project page

title: Project Listing with Sorting and Filtering
description: Verify that users can browse projects and apply sorting and filtering options correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to project listing page
Apply filters by category and sort by popularity or date
Verify the displayed project list matches the applied filters and sorting

title: Like a Project Once Per User and Toggle
description: Verify that an authenticated user can like a project once, can toggle like/unlike, and like count updates correctly.

steps.description: Sign in as user
Navigate to a project detail page
Click like button on the project
Verify like count increments by 1 and UI indicates project is liked
Click like button again to unlike
Verify like count decrements by 1 and UI indicates project is not liked

title: Add Comments as Authenticated User and Guest
description: Verify both authenticated users and anonymous guests can add comments to projects, with appropriate author attribution.

steps.description: Navigate to project detail page
As authenticated user, post a comment
Verify comment is displayed with authenticated user's name or username
Sign out and post a comment as guest with an optional name
Verify comment is displayed with guest name if provided, else marked as anonymous

title: View Count Increment with Session Deduplication and Bot Filtering
description: Verify that project and profile view counts increment correctly with unique counts per session and exclude traffic from bots and crawlers based on user agent filtering.

steps.description: Visit a project detail page multiple times within the same session
Verify the view count increments only once per session
Use a known bot user-agent and access the page
Verify no view count increment occurs for bot traffic

title: Admin YouTube Video Manager CRUD Operations and Metadata Retrieval
description: Verify that admins can create, read, update, and delete homepage video showcases via admin panel, and that YouTube metadata is fetched and displayed correctly.

steps.description: Sign in as admin user
Navigate to admin video manager dashboard
Add new YouTube video by URL
Verify YouTube metadata (title, thumbnail, description) is scraped and displayed
Update video details
Verify changes are saved and reflected
Delete a video from the list
Verify video is removed from the homepage showcase

title: Light and Dark Mode Theme Switching
description: Verify that users can switch between light and dark modes using the theme toggle, and the UI updates responsively using Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui components.

steps.description: Navigate to any page
Use the theme toggle to switch between light and dark modes
Verify the UI colors and components update accordingly and persist across pages

title: SEO Metadata and Structured Data Verification
description: Verify that profile and project pages include proper SEO metadata, OpenGraph tags, structured data, and clean URLs to support search engine indexing.

steps.description: Navigate to a user profile page
Check that metadata tags (title, description, OpenGraph) and structured data are present and valid
Navigate to a project detail page
Check SEO metadata, structured data, and clean URL slug format

title: Middleware Enforces Session Management and Email Confirmation
description: Verify that protected routes require authentication and confirmed email status, redirecting unconfirmed or unauthenticated users appropriately.

steps.description: Try to access a protected route without signing in
Verify redirect to login page
Sign in with unconfirmed email account
Attempt access to protected route
Verify redirect to email confirmation prompt
Sign in with confirmed email account and access protected route
Verify access is granted without redirect

title: Row Level Security Enforcement on Sensitive Data
description: Verify that row level security policies in the database prevent unauthorized access and modification of user profiles and project data.

steps.description: Sign in as User A and attempt to update or delete Project owned by User B via API or UI
Verify that the operation is denied and appropriate error is returned
Sign in as User A and retrieve project list
Verify only projects accessible/owned by User A are returned

title: Performance Validation for Core Web Vitals
description: Verify that pages meet Core Web Vitals performance benchmarks: LCP under 2.5 seconds, FID under 100ms, CLS under 0.1

steps.description: Load homepage and key pages (profile, project)
Measure and verify LCP < 2.5s, FID < 100ms, CLS < 0.1 using Lighthouse or equivalent

title: SEO-friendly URL Routing for Profiles and Projects
description: Verify that user profile and project pages use clean and human-readable URLs based on usernames and project slug respectively.

steps.description: Access a user profile page via /[username] URL
Verify page loads correctly and URL contains only username
Access a project detail page via /project/[slug] URL
Verify page loads correctly and URL contains SEO-friendly slug
